amendment.description: An amendment technical in nature, to provide funding for the Research and Innovative Technology Administration.
amendment.purpose: Amendment directs the existing $14.7 million in DOT funding to the Research and Innovative Technology Administration rather than towards a new Assistant Secretary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Latham amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Latham.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Latham amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
